content: I was quite busy lately... but after all, the press release made it to a couple of german magazines and bloggers today:-) https://backdrop-cms.de/blog/backdrop-cms-lernt-deutsch
mazze.ch Props to you for all your hard work. (Karma: 5)
...can you please post links to those online sources that have mentioned the article? ...I will then add those to our "external mentions" section :wink:

I just found another german article from Hannover, Germany. Did not know the author yet, will contact her soon:-) https://backdropcms.org/mention/das-ideale-cms-f%C3%BCr-kleine-und-mittlere-unternehmen
If German content is also OK for the mentions page: https://www.indigofloat.at/blog/drupal-8-oder-backdrop-cms
